channel.title: shelly cloud on Shelly CLI
channel.description: Recent content in shelly cloud on Shelly CLI

item.title: shelly cloud auth-status
item.description:
shelly cloud auth-status

Show cloud authentication status

Synopsis

Show the current Shelly Cloud authentication status.

Displays whether you’re logged in, your email, and token validity.

Examples

Options

Options inherited from parent commands

SEE ALSO

  • shelly cloud - Manage cloud connection and Shelly Cloud API

item.title: shelly cloud control
item.description:
shelly cloud control

Control a device via cloud

Synopsis

Control a Shelly device through the Shelly Cloud API.

Supported actions: switch: on, off, toggle cover: open, close, stop, position=<0-100> light: on, off, toggle, brightness=<0-100>

This command requires authentication with ‘shelly cloud login’.

Examples

Options

Options inherited from parent commands

SEE ALSO

  • shelly cloud - Manage cloud connection and Shelly Cloud API

item.title: shelly cloud device
item.description:
shelly cloud device

Show cloud device details

Displays device information including status, settings, and online state.

item.title: shelly cloud devices
item.description:
shelly cloud devices

List cloud-registered devices

Synopsis

List all devices registered with your Shelly Cloud account.

Shows device ID, name, model, firmware version, and online status.

item.title: shelly cloud disable
item.description:
shelly cloud disable

Disable cloud connection

Synopsis

Disable the Shelly Cloud connection for a device.

Once disabled, the device will only be accessible via local network.

Examples

Options

Options inherited from parent commands

SEE ALSO

  • shelly cloud - Manage cloud connection and Shelly Cloud API

item.title: shelly cloud enable
item.description:
shelly cloud enable

Enable cloud connection

Synopsis

Enable the Shelly Cloud connection for a device.

Once enabled, the device will connect to Shelly Cloud for remote access and monitoring.

Examples

Options

item.title: shelly cloud events
item.description:
shelly cloud events

Subscribe to real-time cloud events

Synopsis

Subscribe to real-time events from the Shelly Cloud via WebSocket.

Displays events as they arrive from your cloud-connected devices. Press Ctrl+C to stop listening.

Event types: Shelly:StatusOnChange - Device status changed Shelly:Settings - Device settings changed Shelly:Online - Device came online/offline

Examples

Options

Options inherited from parent commands

SEE ALSO

  • shelly cloud - Manage cloud connection and Shelly Cloud API

item.title: shelly cloud login
item.description:
shelly cloud login

Authenticate with Shelly Cloud

Synopsis

Authenticate with the Shelly Cloud API.

This command authenticates you with the Shelly Cloud service using your email and password. The access token is stored locally for future use.

You can provide credentials via:

  1. Command flags (–email, –password)
  2. Interactive prompts (if TTY available)
  3. Environment variables (SHELLY_CLOUD_EMAIL, SHELLY_CLOUD_PASSWORD)

Examples

Options

Options inherited from parent commands

SEE ALSO

  • shelly cloud - Manage cloud connection and Shelly Cloud API

item.title: shelly cloud logout
item.description:
shelly cloud logout

Clear cloud credentials

Synopsis

Clear the stored Shelly Cloud credentials.

This removes your access token and email from the local configuration. You will need to login again to use cloud commands.

Examples

Options

Options inherited from parent commands

SEE ALSO

  • shelly cloud - Manage cloud connection and Shelly Cloud API

item.title: shelly cloud token
item.description:
shelly cloud token

Show or manage cloud token

Synopsis

Show the current Shelly Cloud access token.

This command displays the access token for debugging purposes. Be careful not to share or expose your token.

Examples

Options
